title: Siru Thoduthalile Song Lyrics Laadam
stanzas:
idhu varayilum
naan ennavillaye
inimayai vaanga.
sila nodigalile
undhan anbile naan

enakke ennai
theriyaamal irundhen
anbey edharkaaga
sirippal ulagai koduthaye
irandam thaai pol
kidaithaye

oru murai kaadhal
iru murai modhal
pala murai saadhal
vaazhkayile

oru murai kaadhal
iru murai modhal
pala murai saadhal
vaazhkayile

alaiye illaa
kadal pola irundhen
anbe edharkaaga
kidaithaai karayaai
nadanthene
kizhakkaai udhithaai
vidinthene

azhage illaa nilam pola
poruthen anbe unakkaga
koduthai unai nee muzhudhaga
eduthaai enayum azhagaga

edhu varai neeyo
adhu varai naano
idhu varai oosai
kadhalile

edhu varai neeyo
adhu varai naano
idhu varai oosai
kadhalile

idhu varayilum
naan ennavillaye
inimayai vaanga.
sila nodigalile
undhan anbile naan

seo.title: Siru Thoduthalile Song Lyrics Laadam
seo.description: Get the complete Siru Thoduthalile Song Lyrics Laadam from Laadam. Read the lyrics penned by Yugabharathi and composed by Dharan Kumar and sung by Bombay Jayashree. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Yugabharathi, Laadam, Dharan Kumar, Bombay Jayashree, Haricharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
